trans-unit.source: Represents a randomly accessed view of a memory-mapped file.
trans-unit.target: 表示隨機存取的記憶體對應檔案的檢視。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.CreateViewAccessor%2A> method of a <xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile> object to get this view.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.CreateViewAccessor%2A>方法<xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile>即可取得這個檢視的物件。</xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile> </xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.CreateViewAccessor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Clears all buffers for this view and causes any buffered data to be written to the underlying file.
trans-unit.target: 清除此檢視的所有緩衝區，並造成任何緩衝的資料都寫入基礎檔案。

trans-unit.source: If you are using views that are adjacent to each other, this method will also clear the following data, provided its size is equal to a multiple of the system page size: - Any data that precedes the view up until the latest file offset.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用會彼此相鄰的檢視，這個方法也會清除下列資料，提供其大小等於系統分頁大小的倍數:-之前的最新的檔案位移為止檢視任何資料。

trans-unit.source: - Any data that follows the view up until the earliest file offset.
trans-unit.target: 的遵循最早的檔案位移為止檢視任何資料。

trans-unit.source: Methods were called after the accessor was closed.
trans-unit.target: 關閉存取子後呼叫了方法。

trans-unit.source: [Supported in the .NET Framework 4.5.1 and later versions] Gets the number of bytes by which the starting position of this view is offset from the beginning of the memory-mapped file.
trans-unit.target: [在.NET Framework 4.5.1 及更新版本中支援] 取得這個檢視的開始位置的位移之記憶體對應檔的開頭的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes between the starting position of this view and the beginning of the memory-mapped file.
trans-unit.target: 此檢視的開始位置與之記憶體對應檔的開始之間的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: The object from which this instance was created is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 從中建立此執行個體的物件是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a handle to the view of a memory-mapped file.
trans-unit.target: 取得記憶體對應檔檢視的控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: A wrapper for the operating system's handle to the view of the file.
trans-unit.target: 檔案的檢視作業系統的控制代碼的包裝函式。
